Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{3: 'The desert night remains profoundly tranquil, amplifying the crisp crackling of the campfire.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe stays watchful as he meticulously disassembles his joints, removing the accumulated sand lodged within.'}
{3: 'Lubricant, once plentiful in Babylonia, has become a precious resource after he escaped to the surface.'}
{3: 'Having fulfilled his last mission, he harbors no regrets about his departure. Now, unburdened, he can finally unite with the abandoned surface.'}
{3: 'In order to avert further deterioration of this scrapped frame, regular cleaning has become an essential undertaking.'}
{3: 'He repositions the dust cover back to its original spot, giving it two taps to ensure there are no malfunctions.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's pretty cold at night. Come join me by the fire.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He speaks without casting a backward glance. Eventually, two figures emerge from the shadows of nearby rocks.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'How did you notice us?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The older person of the two, who seemed to be brothers, asks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's just say experience is the best teacher.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the sixth also the final operation of the Great Evacuation, Watanabe left Babylonia.'}
{3: 'He made his way back to the forsaken surface by blending into a transport craft carrying scrapped frames.'}
{3: 'The situation on the surface has proven worse than expected.'}
{3: 'The Great Evacuation stripped away resources, technology, and order, leaving behind only scars, foolishness, and chaos in its wake.'}
{3: 'When flipping a switch fails to bring bright light, when turning a faucet no longer yields clean water, and when all familiar conveniences vanish in a mere half year...'}
{3: 'Crushed by despair, people either have chosen to end their lives, or surrender to a life of reckless debauchery...'}

{3: 'The opening act of the apocalypse takes the form of a competition known as "desire," where inflicting harm and plundering others becomes a means to fill the void created by an overwhelming disparity.'}
{3: 'Hell has descended upon Earth.'}
{3: 'Naturally, many have set their eyes on Watanabe, or more precisely, the parts on his frame.'}
{3: 'After dealing with several waves of blatant attackers, he has learned to distinguish between those enslaved by their desires and rational survivors.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you're worried about me being a threat to you...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe tosses a bundle of dry branches over, causing the younger one to instinctively jump back.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Take this firewood. Need a lighter?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After arranging the firewood into a small pile, the man retrieves a lighter from his pocket.'}
{3: 'A spark flickers into existence, yet no flame rises.'}

{3: 'The man persists, attempting several more times until a tiny flame finally emerges. Hastily shielding it from the wind and sand with his body, he cautiously approaches the pile of dry leaves...'}
{3: 'A gust of wind suddenly sweeps through, piercing his tattered cloak.'}
{3: 'The flame flickers briefly, then extinguishes, leaving the man frozen in place.'}
{3: 'Watanabe pulls out a flaming stick from his bonfire and rises to his feet, prompting the two Scavengers to spring up nearly simultaneously, their hands moving toward their waists.'}
{3: 'However, Watanabe simply plants the burning stick in the sand between them and sits back down.'}
{1: '1', 3: "After a moment of hesitation, the man strides toward the center, withdraws the stick, and retreats to his younger brother's side, his gaze fixed firmly on Watanabe."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The second campfire finally ignites, illuminating their faces.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The campfire crackles persistently amid the ensuing silence. Eventually, as the third spark disperses and the man prods the firewood with the stick for the fifth time...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watt', 3: 'My name is Watt, and this is my brother, Felix. What about you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Watanabe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'You\'ve sure got guts... Are you also searching for the "Oasis"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'I heard they are soldiers from the old era, with food, water, and guns...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "Most importantly... it's said that they still abide by the law. Even if it's just partly, that's enough in this messed-up world.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man moves closer to the campfire, trying to warm up.'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "Living like this, fighting alone every day, not knowing if I'll survive the next... it's really exhausting...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'His voice is incredibly hoarse as if blended with gravel and rust.'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'We once pursued freedom, but now we desperately crave order, even if it means facing countless obstacles along the way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'If given a choice, who would want to turn back into a beast living in the wild?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Did you get any lead?', 4: '1'}
{3: "After a moment's hesitation, the man casts a glance at the campfire before him and then cautiously retrieves a worn and tattered hand-drawn map from his pocket."}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'I bought this map from a traveling merchant. That bastard took two bottles of water and a can from me.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He points to a green mark on the map.'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'This is the "Oasis". I heard it used to be a military base for training recruits, and now it\'s their headquarters.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't want to let you down, but that place is deserted now. All the equipment and supplies have been taken away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All that's left are dormitories waiting to get rusted and sand everywhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "You've been there?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is the only thing they left behind.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'By the firelight, Watt sees a flag with holes in it—the only thing Watanabe brought back from the old, familiar training base.'}
{3: "The mark on the flag is identical to the one on Watt's map."}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'That... bastard!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Watt raises his hand, wanting to hurl the map into the fire, yet eventually, he only exhales a sigh of resignation.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watt', 3: 'I\'m fine. That traveling merchant probably didn\'t know the "Oasis" was deserted either.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "Thanks. If it weren't for you, we would've made a wasted trip.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What do you plan to do next?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "I don't know... Just keep moving, I guess...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "If we can't find a safe haven here, we'll move on to the next place, or just die on the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "That's the fate of people like us who weren't chosen to board the airship.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Since our goals align, how about we travel together?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: '...You really are a kind person.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man lets out a chuckle, then shakes his head.'}

{2: 'Watt', 3: "That's precisely why I don't want to walk ourselves into a mess... Without blood relations or other strong bonds, most travel companions end up turning against each other, fighting over a mere bottle of water or a can of food.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'When that happens, this current harmony will just be history.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't have that kind of concern, because I'm a Construct.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So, if you're worried about me being a threat, I can understand.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Facing Watt's honesty, Watanabe likewise directly points out the potential concern for him."}
{3: 'To avoid or to grasp that extended hand, to continue doubting or to trust?'}
{3: 'Watt watches the campfire burn quietly before him.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Felix', 3: 'So... if we find food and water, will you let us have it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In contrast to the worries that burden adults, children often have a much simpler way of thinking.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Of course, those things should be given to those in need.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "Heh, since my brother says so, I'll go with you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: "But perhaps it's this simplicity that can rebuild connections in a complicated world."}
{3: 'The lone traveler is no longer alone.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Throughout his journey in search of the "Oasis", he has encountered people from all walks of life.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory541.jpg'}
{3: 'Some joined the group because of a helping hand...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: 'Thank you for saving me... Thank you... sob... I thought...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Some joined because of recognition of the same identity...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leon', 3: 'You were also in the Ground Force? Which team?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Some came to seek refuge...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jerry', 3: "Can you take me in? Too many people covet my parts. You're a Construct, too, so you know what I mean, right...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Some huddled together for warmth...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Humanity Corp Leader', 3: "Alright, you're the boss from now on. My bad for yelling at you all earlier.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_20.jpg'}
{3: 'Soldiers, Constructs, engineers, scientists...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_21.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_21.jpg'}
{3: 'Refugees, doctors, painters, writers...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_22.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_22.jpg'}
{3: 'All kinds of people joined the group, supporting one another and surviving together.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_23.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_23.jpg'}
{3: 'Before they realized it, they already let go of their initial goal—finding the "Oasis".'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_24.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_24.jpg'}
{3: 'And finally, they were given a name...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory835.jpg'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah, what do you think?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leon', 3: 'Sounds like some underground organization that will be hidden for a long time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jerry', 3: 'I like it. In a time like this, not being noticed is a blessing...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: "Hey, can't you try to be more positive? But... well, it's true—we, the ones who remain on the surface, are just a bunch of abandoned souls.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "The abandoned people came together to avoid being forgotten. Fits our situation pretty well, doesn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Then, shouldn't it be the Abandoned?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leon', 3: 'That sounds too bad.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jerry', 3: 'That sounds too bad.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: 'Haha... it is a bit plain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Alright, forget I said anything.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So, the name's confirmed?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'Wait... Watanabe, are you still holding onto that flag?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You mean this one?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He takes out the old flag that used to fly high at the Oasis camp. Time has worn it out, and the design is barely recognizable anymore.'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: "Now that we've got ourselves a proper name, let's also get the emblem down.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'We all came together in our search for the "Oasis", you know? Even though that\'s history now, we can still honor how it all began.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watt', 3: 'What do you think, Watanabe?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I think they'd be happy to be remembered this way.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: 'Hey, I think we can incorporate a desert theme into the design here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Flames, there's gotta be fluttering flames!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leon', 3: "Don't forget the solemn aura of soldiers...", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Everyone chimes in with ideas; even the usually timid Jerry joins the discussion.'}

{3: "When they present the artist at the camp with a collection of nonsensical phrases for assistance in designing, his furious shouts reverberate through the entire area, but that's a story for another time."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory835.jpg'}
{3: 'A few days later.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: "Hmm... I still think it's too plain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leon', 3: "It's a flag emblem. Being too complex isn't a good thing, either, you know?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'If you can convince Anthony to redraw it, you have our support.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "No, no, it's my problem of not having an eye for art.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Then... let's raise it up!", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory854.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The flag rises high, swaying gracefully in the wind amidst the desert...'}
{3: 'Forever standing tall and firm.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory288.png'}
{1: 'Underground Cells', 2: '??：??'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: "It's a shame. I thought you, who have been following Watanabe for the longest time, would understand my choice.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: "You're destroying everything he left behind!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "We didn't come together for revenge, and certainly not to throw the survivors back into war!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'What about you, Jerry?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Babylonia once took you in, but abandoned you when things went south.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Don't you hate them?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jerry', 3: "How could I not... but I still don't agree with starting a war.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: "You're as cowardly as always.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jerry', 3: '...Watanabe once told me, letting go of your hatred for others is a braver act than dragging others into it for yourself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jerry', 3: "That's what makes him different from you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leon', 3: "Jerry, don't even bother.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An aged soldier, burdened by heavy chains, slowly approaches the door from the depths of the cell.'}
{2: 'Leon', 3: 'Ballard, is this impulsive or premeditated?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leon', 3: 'Or should I address you by your code name from the "Oasis" days?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leon', 3: 'Generalissimo.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: "I'm sorry, but I must ask you to stay here for a while.", 4: '1'}
